S.FORM: pitu tmucing tehuk saku pqwasan kira.
pito tmocing tehok sako pqwasan kira.
S.TRANSL: 我今天七點要到學校。
I arrived at school at seven today.

S.FORM: mqwas biru la, nyux tehuk Sinsiy, kmal pgleng "tuliq! tatuk tunux!"
mqwas biro la, nyox tehok Sinsiy, kmal pgleng "toliq! tatok tonox!"
S.TRANSL: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”

S.FORM: hmwaw myan kmal, "lokah su Sinsiy."
hmwaw myan kmal, "lokah so Sinsiy."
S.TRANSL: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”

S.FORM: mqwas sami ga, pcbaq linpgan Sinsiy myan.
mqwas sami ga, pcbaq linpgan Sinsiy myan.
S.TRANSL: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。
In class, the teacher taught us the Tayal language of numbers.

S.FORM: mluw sami Sinsiy lmpuw, mqwas sami linpgan.
mlow sami Sinsiy lmpow, mqwas sami linpgan.
S.TRANSL: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.

S.FORM: pyux kinbaqan maku ke tayal.
pyox kinbaqan mako ke tayal.
S.TRANSL: 我學會好多族語。
I have learned many Tayal languages.

S.FORM: mqwas ku biru krryax, mqbaq ku ke tayal krryax, skayal maku yaya muw.
mqwas ko biro krryax, mqbaq ko ke tayal krryax, skayal mako yaya mow.
S.TRANSL: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。
I go to school every day, I learn the Tayal language every day, and I want to tell my mother.

S.FORM: lalu maku ga Temu.
lalo mako ga Temo.
S.TRANSL: 我的名字是Temu。
My name is Temu.

S.FORM: lalu yaba muw ga Losing.
lalo yaba mow ga Losing.
S.TRANSL: 我爸爸的名字是Losing。
My dad’s name is Losing.

S.FORM: lalu yaya muw ga Rimuy.
lalo yaya mow ga Rimoy.
S.TRANSL: 我媽媽的名字是Rimuy。
My mother’s name is Rimuy.

S.FORM: mpuw kawas maku la.
mpow kawas mako la.
S.TRANSL: 我今年10歲。
I am 10 years old.

S.FORM: maki qutux qbsuyan muw mlikuy, Kuras lalu nya, mpuw qutux kawas nya.
maki qotox qbsoyan mow mlikoy, Koras lalo nya, mpow qotox kawas nya.
S.TRANSL: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Kuras，他今年11歲。
I have a brother, his name is kulas, he is 11 years old.

S.FORM: msqun sami mqwas qutux pqwasan.
msqon sami mqwas qotox pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: 我們在同一間學校讀書。
We study in the same school.

S.FORM: sami ka qbsuyan muw ga smawya sami balay mqwas.
sami ka qbsoyan mow ga smawya sami balay mqwas.
S.TRANSL: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。
Both my brother and I like to sing.

S.FORM: smawya sami balay mlngyaq, trang mhngaw ga, sami qutux ngasal msqun myan musa mlngyaq.
smawya sami balay mlngyaq, trang mhngaw ga, sami qotox ngasal msqon myan mosa mlngyaq.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.

S.FORM: blaq maku smrangi giqas na rangi,aki sami msqun mqwas ru mlngyaq.
blaq mako smrangi giqas na rangi,aki sami msqon mqwas ro mlngyaq.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.

S.FORM: laqi saku na tayal.
laqi sako na tayal.
S.TRANSL: 我是泰雅族的小孩。
I am an Atayal child.

S.FORM: cyux maki Skaru ngasal muw.
cyox maki Skaro ngasal mow.
S.TRANSL: 我家住在霞喀羅。
Our family lives in Skaru.

S.FORM: magal hi myan sami qutux ngasal.
magal hi myan sami qotox ngasal.
S.TRANSL: 我們家共有五個人。
There are five people in our family.

S.FORM: sami qutux ngasal ga ciwal(cyugal) sami mtswe.
sami qotox ngasal ga ciwal(cyogal) sami mtswe.
S.TRANSL: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.

S.FORM: nyux saku mluw maki beh yaba yaya qbsuyan muw mlikuy ka kneril.
nyox sako mlow maki beh yaba yaya qbsoyan mow mlikoy ka kneril.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.

S.FORM: wagiq yaba muw, cyux m'Kinsat yaba muw.
wagiq yaba mow, cyox m'Kinsat yaba mow.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。
My father is tall and he is a policeman.

S.FORM: hlawax yaya muw, cyux m'Sinsiy na mita nbu' yaya muw.
hlawax yaya mow, cyox m'Sinsiy na mita nbo' yaya mow.
S.TRANSL: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.

S.FORM: maki ngasal ga skayal saku nya ke tayal yaba muw.
maki ngasal ga skayal sako nya ke tayal yaba mow.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。
My father speaks the tayal language with us at home.

S.FORM: mhngaw 'bagan ga musa sami qalang rgyax.
mhngaw 'bagan ga mosa sami qalang rgyax.
S.TRANSL: 我們暑假都會回部落。
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.

S.FORM: sami ka qbsuyan muw ga msqun sami musa kmyap qpatung.
sami ka qbsoyan mow ga msqon sami mosa kmyap qpatong.
S.TRANSL: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.

S.FORM: blaq maku balay sami qutux ngasal.
blaq mako balay sami qotox ngasal.
S.TRANSL: 我很喜歡我們家的人。
I like our family very much.

S.FORM: mnwah myan mzwi tanux sami ka yaya muw.
mnwah myan mzwi tanox sami ka yaya mow.
S.TRANSL: 我和媽媽有出去玩。
I went out with my mother today.

S.FORM: qlyan ga mlabu balay kayal, ini kilux ru ini hiyaq uziy, tbasaw balay behuy nya.
qlyan ga mlabo balay kayal, ini kilox ro ini hiyaq oziy, tbasaw balay behoy nya.
S.TRANSL: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.

S.FORM: mtama sami mtasiq k'mal maniq Menpaw, ru pbu wagi, hrhul balay.
mtama sami mtasiq k'mal maniq Menpaw, ro pbo wagi, hrhol balay.
S.TRANSL: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.

S.FORM: babaw knryax ga, mtalah qu kayal la.
babaw knryax ga, mtalah qo kayal la.
S.TRANSL: 下午，天空變紅了。
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.

S.FORM: pqutan muw yaya, swa mtalah kayal.
pqotan mow yaya, swa mtalah kayal.
S.TRANSL: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。
I asked my mother why the sky is red.

S.FORM: kmal yaya, musa mwah hazi behuy wah.
kmal yaya, mosa mwah hazi behoy wah.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.

S.FORM: mhngan ga ungat yulung kayal, mhtuw kwara bengah.
mhngan ga ongat yolong kayal, mhtow kwara bengah.
S.TRANSL: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.

S.FORM: musa sami ngasal uziy.
mosa sami ngasal oziy.
S.TRANSL: 我們也要回家了。
We were going home too.

S.FORM: maki saku ska tuqiy usa ngasal ga, mkura saku bengah pqoyat.
maki sako ska toqiy osa ngasal ga, mkora sako bengah pqoyat.
S.TRANSL: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願，
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,

S.FORM: inlungan maku ga laxiy uwah behuy, smawya saku musa mzwi na.
inlongan mako ga laxiy owah behoy, smawya sako mosa mzwi na.
S.TRANSL: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.

S.FORM: nyux syaw ngasal muw pqwasan, mhkani saku musa pqwasan krryax, mhkani saku mwah ngasal uziy.
nyox syaw ngasal mow pqwasan, mhkani sako mosa pqwasan krryax, mhkani sako mwah ngasal oziy.
S.TRANSL: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.

S.FORM: ini kyaba pqwasan myan, ini ktwa Seto nya, mkbbaq myan kwara.
ini kyaba pqwasan myan, ini ktwa Seto nya, mkbbaq myan kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.

S.FORM: msli' pzi'an tanux kwara laqi, mzwi mari, msqun mcisal.
msli' pzi'an tanox kwara laqi, mzwi mari, msqon mcisal.
S.TRANSL: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.

S.FORM: msqun sami mzwi uziy Sinsiy, pqwasan ga qutux ka yaba na ngasal.
msqon sami mzwi oziy Sinsiy, pqwasan ga qotox ka yaba na ngasal.
S.TRANSL: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.

S.FORM: kmagaw myan krryax, si ki mplquy kinwagan myan qsahuy pqbaqan biru.
kmagaw myan krryax, si ki mplqoy kinwagan myan qsahoy pqbaqan biro.
S.TRANSL: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.

S.FORM: maki musa smom tubung, maki musa kmgaw.
maki mosa smom tobong, maki mosa kmgaw.
S.TRANSL: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.

S.FORM: kwagan myan kwara qqlaq na pqwasan uziy, mrraw myan mtzyuwaw, si plqwi krryax pqwasan.
kwagan myan kwara qqlaq na pqwasan oziy, mrraw myan mtzyowaw, si plqwi krryax pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.

S.FORM: nwahan maku mita yutas muw cyux qalang shera.
nwahan mako mita yotas mow cyox qalang shera.
S.TRANSL: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.

S.FORM: bsyaq iyat myan minkita la, s'nun mu balay hiya qasa.
bsyaq iyat myan minkita la, s'non mo balay hiya qasa.
S.TRANSL: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.

S.FORM: ktan saku na yutas muw lga, pniqan saku nya sa'as, pnbwan saku nya Ocya.
ktan sako na yotas mow lga, pniqan sako nya sa'as, pnbwan sako nya Ocya.
S.TRANSL: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.

S.FORM: sbing balay pinnuya yutas muw sa'as qaniy, blaq balay niqun.
sbing balay pinnoya yotas mow sa'as qaniy, blaq balay niqon.
S.TRANSL: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.

S.FORM: Ocya na yutas muw ga qsliq muw uziy, blaq balay nbun.
Ocya na yotas mow ga qsliq mow oziy, blaq balay nbon.
S.TRANSL: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.

S.FORM: ska wagi ga, msqun ku yutas muw mtayak.
ska wagi ga, msqon ko yotas mow mtayak.
S.TRANSL: 中午的時候，我和爺爺一起煮午餐。
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.

S.FORM: piyux balay pincyakan yaki muw, maki qulih hi ngta qabang ru masut.
piyox balay pincyakan yaki mow, maki qolih hi ngta qabang ro masot.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.

S.FORM: babaw kryaxan lga, musa myan qmazih magal ramat.
babaw kryaxan lga, mosa myan qmazih magal ramat.
S.TRANSL: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.

S.FORM: piyux balay pin'aras yaki muw ngahi sehuy ru qenuw, rasiy ngasal ma.
piyox balay pin'aras yaki mow ngahi sehoy ro qenow, rasiy ngasal ma.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.

S.FORM: psgayun maku, ru kyalun muw mha wahay misu mita babaw nya loziy. psgayun maku, ru kyalun muw mha wahay misu mita babaw nya loziy.
psgayon mako, ro kyalon mow mha wahay miso mita babaw nya loziy. psgayon mako, ro kyalon mow mha wahay miso mita babaw nya loziy.
S.TRANSL: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.

S.FORM: ryax soni ga nyux samiy rasun Sinsiy mwah lmosay mita qqsinuw qnalang, ru mbkuw myan kyopan blihun maziy Kipu.
ryax soni ga nyox samiy rason Sinsiy mwah lmosay mita qqsinow qnalang, ro mbkow myan kyopan blihon maziy Kipo.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.

S.FORM: mzyup samiy qqsinuw qnalang lga,kmal Sinsiy mha:"te gling ga qbhniq,te suruw ga mqu,ktay kya nanak. mzyup samiy qqsinuw qnalang lga, kmal Sinsiy mha, "te gling ga qbhniq, te suruw ga mqu, ktay kya nanak."

mzyop samiy qqsinow qnalang lga,kmal Sinsiy mha:"te gling ga qbhniq,te sorow ga mqo,ktay kya nanak. mzyop samiy qqsinow qnalang lga, kmal Sinsiy mha, "te gling ga qbhniq, te sorow ga mqo, ktay kya nanak."
S.TRANSL: so you can visit them yourself.""
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back

S.FORM: mngungu saku mqu, nanu ini saku kita mqu hiya.
mngongo sako mqo, nano ini sako kita mqo hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.

S.FORM: piyux balay qbhniq ktan maku, cyux mlaka babaw qhuniq, ru ktan maku nguyaq cyux m'abi bling qhuniq.
piyox balay qbhniq ktan mako, cyox mlaka babaw qhoniq, ro ktan mako ngoyaq cyox m'abi bling qhoniq.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.

S.FORM: zik qqsinuw qnalang ga maki Zo, rme, kli ka, iyat maku kntan na qqsinuw, nyux maku ktan soni ga mqas ku balay.
zik qqsinow qnalang ga maki Zo, rme, kli ka, iyat mako kntan na qqsinow, nyox mako ktan soni ga mqas ko balay.
S.TRANSL: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.

S.FORM: piyux nagal muw Syasing, spkita muw yaba yaya.
piyox nagal mow Syasing, spkita mow yaba yaya.
S.TRANSL: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.

S.FORM: babaw nya ga pgluw saku yaba yaya mwah.
babaw nya ga pglow sako yaba yaya mwah.
S.TRANSL: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。
Next time I will come with my parents.

S.FORM: hngawan ryax qaniy ga, musa samiy mita mama myan samiy ka qbsuyan muw kneril.
hngawan ryax qaniy ga, mosa samiy mita mama myan samiy ka qbsoyan mow kneril.
S.TRANSL: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.

S.FORM: aring samiy Bnka mluw Kisya musa Tayto.
aring samiy Bnka mlow Kisya mosa Tayto.
S.TRANSL: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.

S.FORM: tehuk Tayto lga, wahan samiy magal na mama muw beh tpr'an turuy.
tehok Tayto lga, wahan samiy magal na mama mow beh tpr'an toroy.
S.TRANSL: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.

S.FORM: ini tohiq ka n_gan Kisya ngasal mama muw, sobih balay tman turuy lga tehuk.
ini tohiq ka n_gan Kisya ngasal mama mow, sobih balay tman toroy lga tehok.
S.TRANSL: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。
The station is not far from my uncle's house, and it's just a short drive away.

S.FORM: lingay ngasal mama muw ga kya qutux rhiyal qyatan qsinuw yaba balay, mgluw sami hmakay kakay para musa kya.
lingay ngasal mama mow ga kya qotox rhiyal qyatan qsinow yaba balay, mglow sami hmakay kakay para mosa kya.
S.TRANSL: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。
There is a big ranch near my uncle's house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.

S.FORM: maki beh rhiyal qqnyatan qasa ga, rasun samiy na mama muw pqaniq mit ru mtama rme.
maki beh rhiyal qqnyatan qasa ga, rason samiy na mama mow pqaniq mit ro mtama rme.
S.TRANSL: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.

S.FORM: mhngan ga, msqun samiy musa maniq qalang hogan.
mhngan ga, msqon samiy mosa maniq qalang hogan.
S.TRANSL: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.

S.FORM: piyux turuy hogan, nanu yasa qu tama samiy Otobay musa.
piyox toroy hogan, nano yasa qo tama samiy Otobay mosa.
S.TRANSL: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.

S.FORM: aki sami mwah lga, wal qriqun squliq Otobay la, si samiy hakas tama Basu mwah.
aki sami mwah lga, wal qriqon sqoliq Otobay la, si samiy hakas tama Baso mwah.
S.TRANSL: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.

S.FORM: nyux samiy Bnka la, ini baqiy kya nya cyux 'lwan Otobay nya lga mama muw.
nyox samiy Bnka la, ini baqiy kya nya cyox 'lwan Otobay nya lga mama mow.
S.TRANSL: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don't know if my uncle's motorcycle has been found.

S.FORM: cikuy samiy raral ga maki Balung ngasal myan, mqwas samiy biru ru, mwah samiy maki Cyama la, yasa si myan aki hogan mqyanux.
cikoy samiy raral ga maki Balong ngasal myan, mqwas samiy biro ro, mwah samiy maki Cyama la, yasa si myan aki hogan mqyanox.
S.TRANSL: 小時候我們家住在巴陵，上學以後，就搬到了大溪，一直在都市裡生活。
When we were young, our family lived in Balung. After I started school, we moved to Daxi and have been living in the city ever since.

S.FORM: stazil saku mqwas Raygak lga, gmoyaw saku qutux pqbaqun gaga qnxan tayal, kahul sqaniy baq saku tayal Taywan ga bhuyun balay gaga qnxan nha.
stazil sako mqwas Raygak lga, gmoyaw sako qotox pqbaqon gaga qnxan tayal, kahol sqaniy baq sako tayal Taywan ga bhoyon balay gaga qnxan nha.
S.TRANSL: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.

S.FORM: nanu yasa qu, hngawan 'bagan qaniy ga,samiy ka qbsuyan muw musa myan qalang maqut bnkis,sulu' samiy qzinah baq squ gaga qnxan tayal.
nano yasa qo, hngawan 'bagan qaniy ga,samiy ka qbsoyan mow mosa myan qalang maqot bnkis,solo' samiy qzinah baq sqo gaga qnxan tayal.
S.TRANSL: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.

S.FORM: hminas spat pgan kawas nya yutas qasa, ana ga yan aring mt'ru' ktan.
hminas spat pgan kawas nya yotas qasa, ana ga yan aring mt'ro' ktan.
S.TRANSL: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.

S.FORM: pqutan muw hiya nanu llamu ke baqun su kmal, hiya ga blaq balay ke nya tayal, ru baq kmal ke thiluw kmukan Gipun ana ke Amirika baqun nya uziy.
pqotan mow hiya nano llamo ke baqon so kmal, hiya ga blaq balay ke nya tayal, ro baq kmal ke thilow kmokan Gipon ana ke Amirika baqon nya oziy.
S.TRANSL: 我問他會哪些語言，他的泰雅語說得很流利，也會說華語、台語、日語甚至美語也會說。
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Atayal, as well as Chinese, Hokkien, Japanese and English.

S.FORM: pqutan maku ru ubaq, cipoq raral ga minnaki qalang tayal ngasal nha, hiya ga kmukan kneril nya ga Gipun, pcyogan nya ga cyux mimaw ka squliq Amirika, misa balay baq piyux llamu na ke.
pqotan mako ro obaq, cipoq raral ga minnaki qalang tayal ngasal nha, hiya ga kmokan kneril nya ga Gipon, pcyogan nya ga cyox mimaw ka sqoliq Amirika, misa balay baq piyox llamo na ke.
S.TRANSL: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就住在泰雅族部落，自己是台灣人太太是日本人，而他工作業務上跟美國人有關聯，所以他會說這麼多語言。
I asked him to find out that he lived in the Atayal when he was a child, his wife is an Atayal, and he knows many American at work, so he can speak so many languages.

S.FORM: trang samiy mcisal ga, piyux balay gaga na mlata wal nya skayal yutas qasa.
trang samiy mcisal ga, piyox balay gaga na mlata wal nya skayal yotas qasa.
S.TRANSL: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.

S.FORM: ana myan ini baqiy iyal mung ga, ana ga wal myan spowah Rinwasrasun psyasing, baqun kbzih mita loziy.
ana myan ini baqiy iyal mong ga, ana ga wal myan spowah Rinwasrason psyasing, baqon kbzih mita loziy.
S.TRANSL: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.

S.FORM: laqi saku raral ga ini maku baqiy gaga na ita tayal, sksayux maku nanak kuzing ga laqi tayal.
laqi sako raral ga ini mako baqiy gaga na ita tayal, sksayox mako nanak kozing ga laqi tayal.
S.TRANSL: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.

S.FORM: piyux baqun maku lga, kuzing ka tayal qaniy ga, ubaq si p'anak ru stgsyaw maku sinrxan muw.
piyox baqon mako lga, kozing ka tayal qaniy ga, obaq si p'anak ro stgsyaw mako sinrxan mow.
S.TRANSL: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為泰雅族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Atayal is unique and something to be proud of.

S.FORM: gbyan kira ga, mwah ngasal sswe muw la.
gbyan kira ga, mwah ngasal sswe mow la.
S.TRANSL: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。
My younger brother is going home this evening.

S.FORM: mluw saku yaki muw musa tgbiran maziy ngta, lama mnaga wahan maniq sswe muw gbyan.
mlow sako yaki mow mosa tgbiran maziy ngta, lama mnaga wahan maniq sswe mow gbyan.
S.TRANSL: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.

S.FORM: hminas sami tbiran ramat, piyux balay giqas ka misan nagal na rramat.
hminas sami tbiran ramat, piyox balay giqas ka misan nagal na rramat.
S.TRANSL: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.

S.FORM: maziy myan papak qoli ru sakuw ka topu talah.
maziy myan papak qoli ro sakow ka topo talah.
S.TRANSL: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.

S.FORM: nyux syaw tbazing bway na thuki mha, "sbing balay luhiy ka bukil(qbirux) maku ay. baziy cikay ma!"
nyox syaw tbazing bway na thoki mha, "sbing balay lohiy ka bokil(qbirox) mako ay. baziy cikay ma!"
S.TRANSL: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”

S.FORM: maziy samiy luhiy ru bukil(qbirux).
maziy samiy lohiy ro bokil(qbirox).
S.TRANSL: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。
We bought pineapples and peaches.

S.FORM: hminas samiy nyux tbaziy hhi, kmal thuki mha, "nanu birun su? ngta soni qaniy ga qthuy ru msyam balay, qutux ga cyugal kbhul pila."
hminas samiy nyox tbaziy hhi, kmal thoki mha, "nano biron so? ngta soni qaniy ga qthoy ro msyam balay, qotox ga cyogal kbhol pila."
S.TRANSL: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”

S.FORM: hmit iyal mha yaki muw, pqutan nya thuki aki hmswa hwaziy hazi.
hmit iyal mha yaki mow, pqotan nya thoki aki hmswa hwaziy hazi.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.

S.FORM: ana ga smyuk thuki mha wal hwayun la, iyat hitan la.
ana ga smyok thoki mha wal hwayon la, iyat hitan la.
S.TRANSL: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.

S.FORM: nyux maki te lingay na tthuki mha, wah maziy qulih muw, qulih muw ga hopa ru hway.
nyox maki te lingay na tthoki mha, wah maziy qolih mow, qolih mow ga hopa ro hway.
S.TRANSL: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.

S.FORM: pucing nya lga maziy samiy ngta ru qulih, wahan mtayak ngasal si ks'un thikan niqan (Hanray) rramat pincyakan.
pocing nya lga maziy samiy ngta ro qolih, wahan mtayak ngasal si ks'on thikan niqan (Hanray) rramat pincyakan.
S.TRANSL: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.

S.FORM: bsiq in_gan myan, mnkum kayal la.
bsiq in_gan myan, mnkom kayal la.
S.TRANSL: 等了好久，天已經黑了。
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.

S.FORM: qmuyut hray sswe muw mha, si ptbah iyat phngaw Hitay, si ki hngawan khnyan thuyay saku mwah la.
qmoyot hray sswe mow mha, si ptbah iyat phngaw Hitay, si ki hngawan khnyan thoyay sako mwah la.
S.TRANSL: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.

S.FORM: kmal yaki mha piyux tnahuk ramat qaniy, say mlawa kwara uwah maniq!
kmal yaki mha piyox tnahok ramat qaniy, say mlawa kwara owah maniq!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!

S.FORM: san maku mlawa ggluw ru rangi, mwah mplaw maniq.
san mako mlawa gglow ro rangi, mwah mplaw maniq.
S.TRANSL: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.

S.FORM: maki qutux tnaqan muw mqwas Lesa lalu nya, mungi balay krryax.
maki qotox tnaqan mow mqwas Lesa lalo nya, mongi balay krryax.
S.TRANSL: 我有一個同學叫Lesa，他常常忘記帶東西。
I have a classmate named Lesa, he often forgets to bring things.

S.FORM: trang samiy mqwas ga, si gryax ksyuw 'enpit, ssom ru biru brwan.
trang samiy mqwas ga, si gryax ksyow 'enpit, ssom ro biro brwan.
S.TRANSL: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.

S.FORM: minnxal, minsazing, mincyugal, ga ksyugan nha ha.
minnxal, minsazing, mincyogal, ga ksyogan nha ha.
S.TRANSL: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.

S.FORM: ana ga yaqih gaga nya, ksyuw ga ini nya kbzihiy kruma.
ana ga yaqih gaga nya, ksyow ga ini nya kbzihiy kroma.
S.TRANSL: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.

S.FORM: pucing nya ini swayal ksyuw kwara la.
pocing nya ini swayal ksyow kwara la.
S.TRANSL: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.

S.FORM: maki qutux ryax, mgluw samiy musa lmosay.
maki qotox ryax, mglow samiy mosa lmosay.
S.TRANSL: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。
One day, we all went on an outing together.

S.FORM: maki myan ska pknyun, sulu musa tanux qu Lesa, ana ga ini aras rbal ssom.
maki myan ska pknyon, solo mosa tanox qo Lesa, ana ga ini aras rbal ssom.
S.TRANSL: 路途中，Lesa想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。
On the way, Lesa wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.

S.FORM: aki ksyuw rbal ssom, ana ga kmal kwara mha, ini samiy aras uziy.
aki ksyow rbal ssom, ana ga kmal kwara mha, ini samiy aras oziy.
S.TRANSL: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.

S.FORM: memaw mngilis Lesa. t'uqu kmal mha, swa simuw ini saku ksyugiy rbal ssom kwara!
memaw mngilis Lesa. t'oqo kmal mha, swa simow ini sako ksyogiy rbal ssom kwara!
S.TRANSL: Lesa急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!
Lesa burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!

S.FORM: kyalun ni tnaqan mqwas, swa su ini aras nanak, kryax ksyugan misu qeqaya ga, ini su bzihiy uziy.
kyalon ni tnaqan mqwas, swa so ini aras nanak, kryax ksyogan miso qeqaya ga, ini so bzihiy oziy.
S.TRANSL: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!

S.FORM: kinsuxal nya mqwas biru lga, mziboq balay tehuk pqwasan qu Lesa, kwara kinsyugan nya qeqaya ga wal nya bzihan tnaqan mqwas kwara la.
kinsoxal nya mqwas biro lga, mziboq balay tehok pqwasan qo Lesa, kwara kinsyogan nya qeqaya ga wal nya bzihan tnaqan mqwas kwara la.
S.TRANSL: 隔天上學，Lesa很早就到學校了，Lesa把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。
The next day at school, Lesa arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.

S.FORM: mkura squ tnaqan mqwas tmatuk tunux, kmal mha aring sqaniy lga aras saku nanak la, ru mhway simuw balay pksyugan saku raral mha.
mkora sqo tnaqan mqwas tmatok tonox, kmal mha aring sqaniy lga aras sako nanak la, ro mhway simow balay pksyogan sako raral mha.
S.TRANSL: Lesa向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。
Lesa apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.

S.FORM: yaba muw ga lhani pqalup samiy qutux qalang.
yaba mow ga lhani pqalop samiy qotox qalang.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.

S.FORM: trang saku laqi ga, yaba muw ru mama muw ga mhngan mhutang, maras lalaw ru patus.
trang sako laqi ga, yaba mow ro mama mow ga mhngan mhotang, maras lalaw ro patos.
S.TRANSL: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.

S.FORM: slwan lga, hnyan maras nagal nha qqsinuw.
slwan lga, hnyan maras nagal nha qqsinow.
S.TRANSL: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.

S.FORM: kruma ga bzyok qnhyun, kruma ga yapit, ini si ryax maki laqung hiya.
kroma ga bzyok qnhyon, kroma ga yapit, ini si ryax maki laqong hiya.
S.TRANSL: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.

S.FORM: blequn nha qmasuw beh tanux qalang, ru pngsa nha tayal.
bleqon nha qmasow beh tanox qalang, ro pngsa nha tayal.
S.TRANSL: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.

S.FORM: si saku gryax kzibuw yaba muw, gluw saku yaba musa mlata uziy.
si sako gryax kzibow yaba mow, glow sako yaba mosa mlata oziy.
S.TRANSL: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.

S.FORM: kmal yaba muw mha hopa su babaw nya lga yasa qu rasaw misu la.
kmal yaba mow mha hopa so babaw nya lga yasa qo rasaw miso la.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.

S.FORM: mlikuy tayal te qalang ga smi mrusa uziy, kbalay qzyulang ini ga tmrangay. tmrangay
mlikoy tayal te qalang ga smi mrosa oziy, kbalay qzyolang ini ga tmrangay. tmrangay
S.TRANSL: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.

S.FORM: baq balay kbalay srahan yaba muw, kmal mha, qaniy ga kyap laqung, si ki blequn ta mita turu ka rapal qqsinuw, ru bhngun beh tuqiy nya balay.
baq balay kbalay srahan yaba mow, kmal mha, qaniy ga kyap laqong, si ki bleqon ta mita toro ka rapal qqsinow, ro bhngon beh toqiy nya balay.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.

S.FORM: aki saku thuyay helaw mluw bnkis musa mlata uziy, si saku pqbaq mhung rangay krryax, nway saku helaw magal qqsinuw kahul bnhung maku rrangay.
aki sako thoyay helaw mlow bnkis mosa mlata oziy, si sako pqbaq mhong rangay krryax, nway sako helaw magal qqsinow kahol bnhong mako rrangay.
S.TRANSL: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.

S.FORM: ktan yaba muw bnhung maku si kayal mha musa su iyat kinqeri na pqalup babaw nya wah.
ktan yaba mow bnhong mako si kayal mha mosa so iyat kinqeri na pqalop babaw nya wah.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.

S.FORM: misuw qaniy lga nyux saku mrkyas la, maras saku bhuniq pneluq, mluw saku yaba musa mlata.
misow qaniy lga nyox sako mrkyas la, maras sako bhoniq pneloq, mlow sako yaba mosa mlata.
S.TRANSL: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.

S.FORM: trang sami msbzinah mwah ngasal lga musa myan spngsa nagal myan qqsinuw.
trang sami msbzinah mwah ngasal lga mosa myan spngsa nagal myan qqsinow.
S.TRANSL: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.

S.FORM: kmal yaba muw mha, anay ta shway utux kinmkesan, nyux ta nya biqan qoyat ka qqsinuw.
kmal yaba mow mha, anay ta shway otox kinmkesan, nyox ta nya biqan qoyat ka qqsinow.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.

S.FORM: sasal ga mqsuqi saku tehuk pqwasan.
sasal ga mqsoqi sako tehok pqwasan.
S.TRANSL: 我早上上學遲到了。
I was late for school this morning.

S.FORM: musa saku pqwasan ga, mungi saku maras kabang syan biru.
mosa sako pqwasan ga, mongi sako maras kabang syan biro.
S.TRANSL: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.

S.FORM: ana nanu ini saku aras.
ana nano ini sako aras.
S.TRANSL: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。
I didn't bring anything with me.

S.FORM: mqbaq biru lga, si saku msqun mita biru ka rogak mu la.
mqbaq biro lga, si sako msqon mita biro ka rogak mo la.
S.TRANSL: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.

S.FORM: mspung miru ga, ksyugan saku enpit ru ssom rogak mu.
mspong miro ga, ksyogan sako enpit ro ssom rogak mo.
S.TRANSL: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.

S.FORM: kyalun saku na sinsiy mha, "babaw nya ga gibuq mtuliq sasal, laxiy qsuqi la!"
kyalon sako na sinsiy mha, "babaw nya ga giboq mtoliq sasal, laxiy qsoqi la!"
S.TRANSL: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""

S.FORM: rangi maku ga Yumin lalu nya, hiya ga laqi na Tayal uziy.
rangi mako ga Yomin lalo nya, hiya ga laqi na Tayal oziy.
S.TRANSL: 我的好朋友叫Yumin，他也是泰雅族的小孩。
My good friend’s name is Yumin, and he is also an Tayal child.

S.FORM: msqun sami mqwas biru beh qalang Knyopan.
msqon sami mqwas biro beh qalang Knyopan.
S.TRANSL: 我們一起在羅浮部落讀書。
We study together in the Knyopan tribe.

S.FORM: lhani sami msqun mung bnkis pqzyu squ pinqzyuwaw, baq sami balay kmayal ke Tayal kwara.
lhani sami msqon mong bnkis pqzyo sqo pinqzyowaw, baq sami balay kmayal ke Tayal kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說泰雅語。
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Tayal proficiently.

S.FORM: wagiq ru qthuy saku kun, Yumin ga rroq ru hikang.
wagiq ro qthoy sako kon, Yomin ga rroq ro hikang.
S.TRANSL: 我很高也很胖，Yumin很矮也很瘦。
I am tall and overweight, while Yumin is short and thin.

S.FORM: mlglaw balay Yumin qasa, qsliq kwara na ssquliq.
mlglaw balay Yomin qasa, qsliq kwara na ssqoliq.
S.TRANSL: Yumin很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。
Yumin is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.

S.FORM: ryax soni ga mspun na smlokah hi pqwasan myan, pyux balay qu pspngan.
ryax soni ga mspon na smlokah hi pqwasan myan, pyox balay qo pspngan.
S.TRANSL: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.

S.FORM: maki hmuluy wasil, kmkah mari, mqzinah, yugi ru mu' slqiy.
maki hmoloy wasil, kmkah mari, mqzinah, yogi ro mo' slqiy.
S.TRANSL: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.

S.FORM: mspung ku mqzinah kun hiya.
mspong ko mqzinah kon hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我比賽跑步。
I participated in the running competition.

S.FORM: trang saku mqzinah ga, mtakuy saku, msramu tari mu.
trang sako mqzinah ga, mtakoy sako, msramo tari mo.
S.TRANSL: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.

S.FORM: ana ga mtuliq saku ru, mkura saku gleng mqzinah loziy.
ana ga mtoliq sako ro, mkora sako gleng mqzinah loziy.
S.TRANSL: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。
But I stood up and continued running forward.

S.FORM: tehuk saku pcingan lga, pqasun kwara squliq mita.
tehok sako pcingan lga, pqason kwara sqoliq mita.
S.TRANSL: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.

S.FORM: ana saku ini laqux te qutux ga, ana ga mqas saku balay, baha hmswa wal saku masuq mspung.
ana sako ini laqox te qotox ga, ana ga mqas sako balay, baha hmswa wal sako masoq mspong.
S.TRANSL: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.

S.FORM: mnwah myan mkal mama mu shera sami ki yaba mu.
mnwah myan mkal mama mo shera sami ki yaba mo.
S.TRANSL: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.

S.FORM: cyux tqlisan kakay nya mama mu.
cyox tqlisan kakay nya mama mo.
S.TRANSL: 叔叔的腳受傷了。
My uncle injured his foot.

S.FORM: kmal qu hiya mha, cyux mbling qu namuw na ngasal ma.
kmal qo hiya mha, cyox mbling qo namow na ngasal ma.
S.TRANSL: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.

S.FORM: trang musa kbalay qu hiya ga, mhutaw kahul namuw.
trang mosa kbalay qo hiya ga, mhotaw kahol namow.
S.TRANSL: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。
He fell off the roof while repairing it.

S.FORM: s'aras hi kacing ru pinro na yaba mu bbiq nya mama mu.
s'aras hi kacing ro pinro na yaba mo bbiq nya mama mo.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.

S.FORM: mcisal sami zik ngasal ki mama mu, piyux balay pinqzyuwaw wal nya spinqzyu.
mcisal sami zik ngasal ki mama mo, piyox balay pinqzyowaw wal nya spinqzyo.
S.TRANSL: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.

S.FORM: mshriq sami ga, strahu saku nya mha wagiq su la, blaq balay inkyasan su.
mshriq sami ga, straho sako nya mha wagiq so la, blaq balay inkyasan so.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.

S.FORM: kyalun maku mha, blaq kakay su lga, wahay misu mita loziy.
kyalon mako mha, blaq kakay so lga, wahay miso mita loziy.
S.TRANSL: come to our house next time and visit us.\""
I said, \When your foot gets better

S.FORM: maki squ 2022 kawas ga, melahuy mrhuw mkayal na Mibunsyo ga swalan miru na lalu Tayal.
maki sqo 2022 kawas ga, melahoy mrhow mkayal na Mibonsyo ga swalan miro na lalo Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.

S.FORM: pqutan maku lhani mkura mrhuw msina ssyun lalu tayal Mibunsyo ka qutux mrkyas Yumin Nawi.
pqotan mako lhani mkora mrhow msina ssyon lalo tayal Mibonsyo ka qotox mrkyas Yomin Nawi.
S.TRANSL: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Yumin Nawi。
I interviewed Yumin Nawi, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.

S.FORM: wal sami rima smun hngaw ryax ga musa saku ngasal nya maqut hiya.
wal sami rima smon hngaw ryax ga mosa sako ngasal nya maqot hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.

S.FORM: trang saku maqut ga, skayal saku nya minkahul inu qu lalu nya, mqbaq sami ki squliq nqu ngasal nya uziy, ru qalang nya.
trang sako maqot ga, skayal sako nya minkahol ino qo lalo nya, mqbaq sami ki sqoliq nqo ngasal nya oziy, ro qalang nya.
S.TRANSL: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.

S.FORM: kyalun maku swa su si ginrhuw 'myuw lalu, yaqih qu sinllwan raral hiya ga?
kyalon mako swa so si ginrhow 'myow lalo, yaqih qo sinllwan raral hiya ga?
S.TRANSL: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?

S.FORM: smyuk mha, baha hmswa ini 'ruyu sbiru lalu thiluw lalu maku tayal, si saku nha ryaxiy nha "yu sen sung", nanu psyaqan saku nha.
smyok mha, baha hmswa ini 'royo sbiro lalo thilow lalo mako tayal, si sako nha ryaxiy nha "yo sen song", nano psyaqan sako nha.
S.TRANSL: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Yu Xian Sheng

S.FORM: kmayal Yumin Nawi mha, sbiru lalu tayal ga yasa qu balay nya, lalu maku tayal ga nyux mkin_giwan ita qutux mtgluw ita qutux ngasal ru sinrxan ta, aki hmswa kbzihay ta lalu ta nanak.
kmayal Yomin Nawi mha, sbiro lalo tayal ga yasa qo balay nya, lalo mako tayal ga nyox mkin_giwan ita qotox mtglow ita qotox ngasal ro sinrxan ta, aki hmswa kbzihay ta lalo ta nanak.
S.TRANSL: our family
Yumin Nawi said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group

S.FORM: hera ga mnwah myan tbran sami ki yaki mu, piyux balay ramat nuya myan naras nya, ru kbalay nniqun na tayal uziy.
hera ga mnwah myan tbran sami ki yaki mo, piyox balay ramat noya myan naras nya, ro kbalay nniqon na tayal oziy.
S.TRANSL: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.

S.FORM: blaq kwara na squliq tbiran yaki mu, skway ru abaw ngahi piyux squliq wal maziy, piyux squliq mwah tmalam pincyakan nya.
blaq kwara na sqoliq tbiran yaki mo, skway ro abaw ngahi piyox sqoliq wal maziy, piyox sqoliq mwah tmalam pincyakan nya.
S.TRANSL: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，絲瓜和地瓜葉很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.

S.FORM: tnahuk nya tqitun ru sumun ga blaq balay niqun, ru syam inbgan maqaw blaq balay niqun na ssquliq, memaw mbkuw maziy kwara squliq.
tnahok nya tqiton ro somon ga blaq balay niqon, ro syam inbgan maqaw blaq balay niqon na ssqoliq, memaw mbkow maziy kwara sqoliq.
S.TRANSL: 她煮的玉米和糯米飯非常好吃，還有馬告鹹豬肉很好吃，大家都來排隊買。
The corn and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.

S.FORM: nyux tmahuk yaki mu ga, maki saku beh nya tmapih squliq. mlawa saku, "nuya myan nanak ramat qaniy, ini rpsiy iyu hazi uwah maziy."
nyox tmahok yaki mo ga, maki sako beh nya tmapih sqoliq. mlawa sako, "noya myan nanak ramat qaniy, ini rpsiy iyo hazi owah maziy."
S.TRANSL: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown

S.FORM: helaw balay wal myan suqun tgbaziy maras myan, kmal yaki mu mha, "ulung isu lokah rmaw."
helaw balay wal myan soqon tgbaziy maras myan, kmal yaki mo mha, "olong iso lokah rmaw."
S.TRANSL: 我們帶的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""

S.FORM: zyuwaw qaniy ga, baqun maku nanu qu qnahul na tayal, ru gmluw musa tgbaziy qaniy uziy ga ini balay k'law.
zyowaw qaniy ga, baqon mako nano qo qnahol na tayal, ro gmlow mosa tgbaziy qaniy oziy ga ini balay k'law.
S.TRANSL: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的難處。
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.

S.FORM: ktan maku yaki mu blaq nya balay muya rramat tayal, mqas saku balay maki balay smyaxan mu uziy.
ktan mako yaki mo blaq nya balay moya rramat tayal, mqas sako balay maki balay smyaxan mo oziy.
S.TRANSL: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常榮耀。
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
